name: Quest To Impress Act 1
description:
IMPORTANT: Quest To Impress is a game based on Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet. This is part of my Honours project by clicking on this link - QuestToImpressQuestionnaire -  and filling out the questionnaire and playing the game you are helping me capture player modelling data that will be used in the second half of my project. All you need to do is fill out the questionnaire until it tells you to play the game, leave the questionnaire open, and upon finishing the game go back to the questionnaire and complete it.

 At the end, you will be asked to email me your player model, this is the csv or excel spreadsheet that can be found in the game's files after finishing the game.  the file path of the spreadsheet is  (Note: the csv file name will have a different number) Email the file to Alexander Purvis 1703361@abertay.ac.uk with subject Quest to impress data file.

I cant thank you enough for helping me with this project and I hope you enjoy the game!
